articles.author: , USA TODAY
articles.title: How to get rid of pimples: Acne solutions and causes explained - USA TODAY
articles.description: Acne is the most common skin condition, affecting up to 50 million Americans annually. Here are some important things to know about treating it.
articles.content: We've all experienced it before: waking up and lazily strolling into the bathroom before catching our reflection in the mirror. Then we spot it that little red bump in the middle of our face, a pimpl… [+5570 chars]
